title: Wheres OCE tribunal ?
body: Like seriously this is fucking stupid , people can just troll and ruin everyone's ranked games as they please, with no consequences at all, its been fucking ages and yet still nothing , yes im mad as fuck , if just had the games ive had you would be to , so where the hell is it , why are toxic feeding trolls not getting banned huh , is fucking ridiculous

replies.body:
>people can just troll and ruin everyone's ranked games as they please, with no consequences at all,

Not true. If a person is consistently behaving in an anti-social manner, enough people will report them and they will get a temporary ban for their troubles. Continued violation will result in a more serious case that a red reviews.

>its been %%%%ing ages and yet still nothing

The Tribunal is not planned to be put back into action. It is in indefinite recess. Riot are hoping the new automated systems will be good enough.

We live in grim times.

the game is ruined, oce is useless they wont improve matchmaking or get rid of the trolls they prefer every person to quit and leave the trolls in the game. no tribunal, nothing worst community in gaming history
